name: Office Secrets
description:
OFFICE SECRETS

Just a regular office it seems but there's something going on just below the surface...

This is our submission to Narrative Imperative Game Jam #1
All feedback appreciated. More endings planned but had to be cut to submit in time.

We've also included a No Tutorial version for subsequent playthroughs :)

How to Play:
Left click to interact. Space to advance dialogue.

Note: If it seems like you can't progress whilst at your desk, click the "in case of emergency" button in the top left to force the game to progress. We have made further updates to resolve any times in the game where you can't progress any further so this should be a last resort.

If you do get stuck, please let us know and sorry in advance!

Thanks for playing.
